themessafterthemarty 161026718112 "2017-05-24 17:27:21 GMT" http://themessafterthemarty.tumblr.com/post/161026718112/psa-for-any-high-schoolers-whore-going-to-college "animentality:  your high school teachers are LIARS. Most college professors accept late assignments. Some of them are so chill that you can ditch most of class so long as you can handle the final.  It’s all about playing it by ear. YOU DON’T ASK TO GO TO THE BATHROOM PLEASE SAVE YOURSELF THE EMBARRASSMENT.  It is NOT harder than high school. You’re more or less ready for it if you do ok in high school
column2: ok? Seriously. I got A’s in AP classes yet was terrified that I wouldn’t be able to handle college. Surprise surprise? AP classes are harder than college classes.  No joke.  College professors are a lot more liberal on what counts as a “right” answer.  Plus they give you points for caring.  Some classes give you points just for showing up.  There’s an atmosphere of controlled panic
column3: and you are not the only one.  You can pretty much go up to anyone and say god life is a nightmare and finals are gonna kick my ass
column5: regardless of how genius they’re supposed to be.  Seriously.  College student here. High school teachers are the WORST of liars. They’ll tell you college is a “whole nother level” but that’s such horse shit.  High school is a standardized sheep counting facility.  College is a research lab full of cats that may or may not do what you expect.  " False text

column2: has allegedly discussed ending her career and is actively blaming herself for all of this and people are angry for her cancelling her tour?? priorities people
column3: please. people have lost their lives. families have been separated
column4: an 8 year old girl has just been identified as the second victim. ariana’s whole team actively tried to protect people by taking young kids into safe areas- include her own mother. this isn’t just a small inconvenience. this is a tragedy. think before you react. i’ve got too many people around me thinking about themselves other than those who deserve and need it. people still do not consider their idols as human and continue to expect ariana to tour when she’s in pain. it’s sickening.   CREDIT  and you know people would have accused her for being heartless and unaffected if she kept going. same people? maybe not. but the accusation would have been there." False text

It makes you think that nothing is wrong with you
column2: that you just feel this way because you lack value as a person. Whether that’s in your relationships
column5: it makes you think you aren’t good enough for any of that. “It’s not the illness
column7: “You feel this way because it’s who you are.”  “Mental illness is like fighting a war where the enemy’s strategy is to convince you that the war isn’t actually happening.” " False text

column1: themessafterthemarty 159856211254 "2017-04-22 08:37:20 GMT" http://themessafterthemarty.tumblr.com/post/159856211254/sunny-days-return-sesame-street-is "rootbeergoddess: profeminist:  “Two years after “Sesame Street” debuted an autistic Muppet named Julia on their digital program
column2: the orange-haired tyke is now going to appear on the actual television show. “It’s tricky because Autism is not one thing
column3: because it is different for every single person who has autism. There is an expression that goes
column4: ‘If you’ve met one person with Autism
column5: you’ve met one person with Autism
column6: ’” “Sesame Street” writer Christine Ferraro told “60 Minutes” reporter Lesley Stahl on. If the character of Julia does her job
column8: “when [children] encounter [people with disabilities] in their real life it’s familiar. And they see that these — these can be their friends too.” A survey released by the Kennedy Krieger Institute in Baltimore and Johns Hopkins University in 2012 found that 63 percent of children with autism spectrum disorders had been bullied. They were three times more likely to experience bullying than their non-autistic peers.” Read the full piece here ❤     ❤   ❤   ❤   The Trump budget pulls money from PBS
column9: the makers of Sesame Street.  Please follow them and support if you can! https://twitter.com/PBS/status/841295289377943552  For real
column10: people don’t understand how important this is because little kids who are autistic are going to feel validated and important because of her " False link
